attributes.action: UK suppliers & manufacturers for UK school uniforms
attributes.additional_details:
9.5 million UK children x £200 for school uniform = 1.9 BILLION POUNDS that should be going into the British economy and providing jobs.
Sign this petition to the Government so that they can legislate schools in line with other statutory and funded service providers to apply The Green Code to their own procurement and the purchasing they enforce on parents particularly school uniform.

rejection.details: The Department for Education is responsible for schools in England only
